text: @johncardillo @realDonaldTrump Why don’t we just use Sweden’s example. They are using natural herd immunity. They didn’t close anything, not even a school. Simple government warnings and guidelines but no closings. They have a population of 10 million. https://t.co/lIS0Vxt8zJ
